content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine on vaction in iwo jima, japan sent me an awesome picture of the sunset over the water, the very second i opened it up i see some odd shape off the left sice of the sun. i pointed it out joking about it being nibru, thats when my friend (who wants to remain un named and dose not want anything to do with submitting the picture either) noticed it we started talking about it then i noticed towards the the right above the the sun is another light. really dont have any other information on that, we couldnt decide what it was so the only people we know who can are yall.
content.summary: A friend in iwo jima japan sent this he didnt even notice it till i did.

content.detailedDescription: I was in marshfield mo, and was just star gazing like i do all the time on clear nicely weathered nights with my binoculars and saw many things and on many occasions see objects in the sky that would just move faster than a plane would but be blinking with lights and would make no noise and past through and change their flight pattern quick and turn quick and do things a plane wouldn't do or physically and to how advanced we are our planes cant turn that quick. when i first saw the objects before i seen the first landings and hovers over my head encounters i thought it was pretty cool and i enjoyed looking at them through binoculars they were close enough to see the outside body clear as day. but some just moved and hovered and was a distance but it was a color changing orb and moved slow and abnormal i felt safe till i seen the landing and hovered over twice a couple days ago i seen a landing the craft was spinning while hovering and had dim lights four total and finally it stopped spinning and landed and the the craft turned of and i couldn't see but the day before yesterday i seen one hover over me in springfield mo, i was in a dark place in town and i see the bright lights like it was patroling then stoped hover and it sounded like a plane but it was hovering still and going back and forth that was scary i feel like theyre coming for me cause i know to much or something lol

content.detailedDescription: This phenomenon had been occurring for several days so i started to record, i've been seeing these ufos since i was 7, so i'm a firm believer, well this tunnel of light opened like a falling star from top to bottom stretching from thin to wider into a 5 or 8 point star shaped ring opening, then the bell shaped object came stretching out, immediately the light tunnel closed behind it, the object hovered then whent nw slowly till it disappeared, i have more videos of these ufos cuz like i said they had been appearing for about 15 days approx. in a row.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A tunnel of light opened the bell shaped object came falling out the tunnel closed then stood still then changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
We, a group of us where sitting at the picnic table talking when one of our group noticed an object approaching from the south east, so i went to my apartment a got my digital camera, when i returned the group where telling me that when it was overhead they could make out the shape of it, which was in a figure eight and solid black in color, i asked where it was and they pointed it out to me just north east of us now. so i started talking picture of it at max zoom of 126x and then it stopped moving and started going up and down in one spot for about five minutes then changed directions and started climbing higher and headed east out of sight.
i have pictures but one of them is the clearest.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It came so close we all could make out the shape of it the ascended

content.detailedDescription:
Hi myself sahel jebisow of india..Saw a ufo which was actually invisible bt its shaped which i saw in moving vehicles light which was actually reflected. nearly 8pm i was near gandhi nagar in public field alone listening music in silliguri west bengal india.  heard sum noise of people conversation of eating and talking dat sum1 said dat he is alone and maybe lost its way shuold we helped him.. as there was i alone and again i thought dat it was sumthing else bt agaim 1 lady served me there omlete and as ate it.. it not an omlete bt it was actually a gum named denrite which is used to stick tiles to floor then i vomit it and went for some drinks in the stall and as i return to my place wher i was before in the field then suddenly air rushes there was no noise and within a blink a circle shaped or like a saucepan shaped ship flew away to the sky it was actually invisible bt i saw its shaped due to moving vehicles nearby road... and one thing i notiched that before this thing happened moon was bright in the sky and it was visible bt suddenly clouds covered the sky and moon was gone.. couldn't see it anymore. date. 20. 04. 2016. and i olso heard that they were speaking various indian languages and frm one i heard he said mangalgraha which means mars in hindi . then suddenly it was a feeling of confusion 8o'clock and open ufo was descended though it was invisible bt i was near to it like 5 to 10 ft and just feeled only oys air waves that also slit one and it was nearly about 5 to 10 huge in circular manner shaped. for further information pls contact in facebook( boozy woozy)thats ma id in fb. 
after the take off there were one bike came rushed frm nowhere and phoned to some one as i was alone in that field. den a man came fem nowhere and talk to them and they all went.  it seems like they were late for the trip. or missed there transport cause they came as when the ufo flew away.
content.summary: Sauce pan shaped bt it was on visible bt its shaped was appearing due to cars dipper

content.detailedDescription: Myself a friend and my wife were in my front yard talking about 9pm.I looked up and said what is that and at that time everyone looked and saw these 7 red spherical lights come over the top of some trees down the street.There was absolutely no sound i first thought they were helicopters but no sound ! they came from about se and flew about nw and they all vanished completely one at a time in the same part of the sky!I have seen things over the years i couldn't explain but i have never seen anything like this,ever !Our friend immediately left and my wife wigged out saying now she had seen everything!She never believed me or my kids when we would talk about seeing something strange,but now she is singing a different story ! i still cannot figure out what we saw i have went over this and i don't know !Also i have spent time on military bases and have seen many types of aircraft and live close to an small airport and i'll say it again,i have never seen anything like this with no sound that low and disappear one at a time in the same part of the sky ! thank you for your work.
content.summary: & red lights appeared flying in a line over trees all vanished in same part of sky

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of this event , i lived in an apartment building which is perched on a hill in the northwestern portion of the bronx along the hudson river. i was laying in a bunkbed, so to view the window i would have to look slightly down. i don't remember what woke me up or why. i do remember seeing a light pass by my window. being very curious i got up thinking it would be a helicopter, some of which have flown through my area with searchlights or merely in passing on their way up the hudson river. my window faces east. from my vantage point it is possible to see most of the bronx, and as far as long island and queens. it is important to note that my apartment gives excellent views of flight paths from both jfk and laguardia airports, as well as views of planes going north onto connecticut or boston, or southwest toward newark and teterboro. but at this particular time of day, about 2:30am, there weren't any other aircraft that were visible. 

it was slightly overcast, with some wind. clouds were at a high altitude. 

after i leave my bed to see what was the source of the light coming through my blinds, i see the object at just about at the same altitude of my 10th floor window, or approximately 150 - 200 feet off the ground to account for being on top of a hill. it was not moving very quickly.  at first the object appeared to be round but as it continued its oval flight path and came toward my window it had the appearance of a slightly stretched egg on its side being slightly thicker on the leading edge. i would not call it a teardrop because it did not taper into a point. it was clearly rounded. by my estimations it appeared to be about 15 - 20  feet long, definitely shorter than some single engine propeller planes that i have seen. the object must have been approximately 200 - 300ft from my window at its closest. it appeared to be solid as it maintained a rigid shape the entire time i viewed it. however i could not see what material it was made of because the whole object was glowing a fluorescent white. i would not say it was radiating light because later when it descended it did not reflect off the surrounding trees or buildings. there were no external lights and no distinct markings or structural shapes that i could discern. it was also completely silent as far as i could tell. 

the object was north-northeast of me when i first saw it. it was moving counter clockwise. the diameter of its oval path when i first saw it must've been about 1 miles north to south and about half a mile from east to west., with the center axis being slightly north of my viewing angle. i watch the object make 2 full rotations along this path. its movements were steady, it did not seem to bobble or sway in anyway.  its rate of speed was also pretty constant during the whole siting but was noticeably slower by the last rotation. each rotation took less than 10 minutes to complete. it appeared to me that each rotations was becoming more rounded and smaller in diameter.  it also appeared as though the center of rotation had moved slightly more east. since it was not radiating light, the light that i saw through my window might have been the object passing by very closely. the area the object was flying over is all residential homes and small businesses. i considered it a very boring neighborhood. there are a few schools in the area. there's a shopping center directly down the hill from me on a pretty major street. that was pretty much it. i think this is important to note: toward the most southernly point of the object's oval path are the official residences of un russian diplomats. i am not pointing out a connection but simply mentioning the coincidence. 

i am watching the object on its 3rd time around, if i'm using its furthest north position as a reference, it stops about 3/4th of the way through without decelerating or adjusting its hover. it had stopped pretty much directly east of me. the area it stopped over is the western portion of van cortlandt park in an area that is near or behind a baseball field i used to frequent. it is just under a mile away from where i live. after about 20 seconds of hovering it descends at a constant rate of speed until it is out of sight, probably hidden by trees. again, the light was not reflecting off any nearby objects. there are buildings within a few yards of where i saw the object descend. 

the shape and path of the object had me convinced it was not a helicopter, but when i saw it land was when it really alarmed me. this is post-9/11 new york city. there are strict air traffic rules. aircraft do not land anywhere but airports and helipads. this is the moment i started questioning what this object was. 

it remains on the ground for about 5 minutes at which point i see it ascend to a slightly higher altitude and then changing direction towards the north east, still ascending as it is moving away. i lose sight of it probably about 5 miles away through the clouds as it was heading toward mount vernon. i can see it move through the clouds as it begins to disappear. 

the whole siting lasted just over half an hour. 

i remained awake for another hour to see if it will return. i regret not having gone to find the site it landed in immediately after the siting. i've been to the area since but have not seen anything out of the ordinary except a few deer. it took me quite a while to conclude that what i saw might have been extraterrestrial. until then i didn't even really know that much about the ufo phenomena. it was a life changing experience that has expanded my perception of reality and its possibilities.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light circling over the bronx at low altitude, landing, then ascending leaving to the ne

content.detailedDescription: Aos 9 anos de idade em sã£o paulo morava prã³ximo a uma estaã§ã£o de distribuiã§ã£o de energia  sempre quando estava vindo da casa da minha vã³ tinha que vir pelo caminhos desertos dos cabos de energia  e sempre por ser inocente nesta ã©poca sempre vim objetos negros com a dimensã£o de 10 metros por  seis de largura eu nã£o entendia isso via diversos raios subindo em direã§ã£o daquele objeto e fazia um barulhos de alta tensã£o vi esta mesma situaã§ã£o por trãªs anos seguidos   apã³s isso toda noite nã£o sei porque eu era levado a subir em cima de minha casa e nã£o entendo porque tinha que ficar olhando para horizonte onde neste dia era 02/06/82 por volta de 05:40 ou 05:30 estava olhando o nascer do sol ai logo apã³s o sol comeã§ar a nascer foi estranho olhei para lã¡ sã³ tem que in vez de um sol e verifique que eram trãªs ai se nã£o entendi senti muito medo ai virei minha cabeã§a para cima ai uma estrela brilhou tã£o forte aquela luz me derrubou em cima da casa isso em questã£o de segundos  ai me levantei com pavor ai eu sentia uma dor em minha cabeã§a  ai fui ate o espelho e tinha em meus cabelos outra cor sendo assim meu cabelo era castanho ai no centro  da cabeã§a estava branco e coro cabeludo vermelho e apã³s isso a minha vida inteira hoje estou com 44 anos hoje dia 20 /04/2016 o ultimo avistamento foi ontem por volta de 19:30 da noite aqui em sã£o paulo foi um deslocamento de um objeto alaranjado que parecia uma estrela mais baixa ai de repente ela se deslocou em uma velocidade anormal e eu mais minha esposa e meu filho vimos e ele disparava e freava rã¡pido foi estranho obrigado por me ouvirem
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Avisitamentos  ufos diversos

content.detailedDescription: When i was 8 years old i was laying in my mom's room on her bed next thing i know i'm paralyzed to the bed i couldn't move couldn't breathe only can think i can move my eyes nothing more all the sudden a bright light shine through the room the light was white and filled the whole room i couldn't see anything but bright white light i try to move try to run couldn't do anything next thing i know the bright lights go on i can move again this is my first encounter i was very scared didn't understand what was happening at the time but knew it wasn't right never told anybody that because what would you say to them after that i have this place on my thumb that i knew wasn't there before is on the back side of my thumb is still there it is a bump about the size of one millimeter another time i was compelled to walk out the back door it was night time maybe midnight next thing i know i see a bright orange fireball lyft from my yard it shot up to two more orange orbs making a triangle out of the 3 now they slowly moved and disappeared into the horizon i seen the same type of orange orb while me and two other people years later we're out in the middle of nowhere and brown county indiana it kept getting closer and closer and closer and i took off in my vehicle and apparently lost it since the first incident i've periodically woke up falling and literally hitting my bed everytime this happens it's very scary i have a feeling of severe disorientation everytime this happens and even fear i am 26 now in this still happens not sure what else to say but it is what it is notice the dot in middle of thumb below nail i've even tried several times to cut it out with no luck. i've tried to cut out because i know it was put there by a being not of this world
content.summary: I was laying on bed suddly paralyzed bright light filled the room white light. i couldn't move only breathe suddly gone and could move again .L

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Yesterday, april 19, 2016 at approximately 7pm, i witnessed a bright and shinning chrome object descend into a weird cloud formation about 4 times right before it completely vanished. each time it started from the same higher elevation and then descended downward right. at first glance it seemed just triangular. however, further focusing made me realize the shape was triangular on top and circular on botton. the encounter itself lasted about 30-45 minutes. after it ended i began to divert my attention elsewhere when i realized that the formation of the clouds were astonishing as well. the cloud formation at the time had me puzzled. unfortunately i had no camera so i drew it out. there were two clouds that had me trying to connect the dots. the first was a simple outline of a bird sitting. maybe a dove? the shape was perfect. the second was even more puzzling. it seemed to be the shape of an arrow with a flame shaped base or the shape of a modern day rocketship. as an amateur stargazer, i am always gazing up night or day as the sky has a story to tell. it is also known that the planet neburu (the apprrent planet that will be earth's fate) that is behind the sun should now be visible as of 4/17/2016. is it coincidence that i encounter this phenomenon the day after? is it also related to the orange light that faded and the white light that faded in the night sky both about a week ago? this was both astonishing and intriguing to me. my thesis: i believe all are related and it is a message that the beginning of whatever is coming (good or bad) has started or it has already begun for some time now. whatever the answer, the beauty of the universe (night or day) will always catch my eye and take my breath away. as most will become frightended, i will remain the "intrigued stargazer" continually searching for answers and i look forward to what lies ahead. if anyone saw what i did, any explainations?
content.summary: Ufo phenominon with a weird cloud formation afterwards

content.detailedDescription: 5 oval crafts hovering in equallateral formation. all looked the same outerus and inner rings of lights pulsated.
content.summary: 5 oval crafts hovering in equallateral formation. all looked the same outerus and inner rings of lights pulsated.

content.detailedDescription: It was just a white round sphere. it had no marker lights at all. no blinking lights. it was just a solid white round sphere of light. i watched it with a pair of 10x50 custom bushnell binoculars. with tripod. i observed it with the tripod set on the ground and also without using the tripod on the ground. i got a good clear look at it. it had no visible faa marker lights, nothing at all blinking on it. just a solid white round sphere. if i get technical on the color it was very white with a very slight hint of amber to it. which could easily be atmospheric conditions or a little color aberration to the binoculars lens looking at a bright object. i watched it move from the west to the east as if to glide as it crossed the salt lake valley. so i seen part of the front and the side the whole time and the rear of it as it left? this to me sounds funny to say because this thing is round. it went southeast as far as celestial north and south is measured. disappearing from view as it went over the mountains east of draper city. it was high enough to clear the mountain range by 2 to 3 thousand feet? it was round and well lit, moved a little slower than the jets heading towards the salt lake international airport. it moved slow and steady, glide like, straight line, same constant altitude. the light of it never wavered, a steady same brightness to it. bright as jupiter is in the night sky and larger in appearance. i heard no sound from it, to be fair, it was not that close. yet i would say if it were a conventional aircraft i would normally hear one at that distance. time was exactly 8:47 pm as it was over half way across the valley, april 19th, 2016
content.summary: white round sphere

content.detailedDescription: Lying awake in bed just looking at the sky. i saw something moving really fast got out of bed before it was out of view watched it zoom in a straight path before it made like a u turn and disappear. the object made me think of a glider. i realised it was moving too fast to be an aeroplane. then when i saw the uturn i realised it wasn't a plane. it was quite fascinating to watch and it happened so quickly. wish i had had the time to grab my phone to record it. got me excited to see it i woke my partner who wasn't too amused at being woken up. would love to see more so i will keep an eye out in future.
content.summary: Boomerang shape no lights fast

content.detailedDescription: 850p. driving home (eastbound through neighborhood) with wife and four children. noticed large triangular formation of three red-orange lights traveling in triangular formation south-bound. appeared to break up after directional change eastbound. appeared to enter into a straight line, before disappearing, one by one. please contact me for photos (not good) and video, if you are interested, as i prefer to not post them randomly.
content.summary: Three glowing red-orange lights in triangle shape. split up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just after sunset on april 18th, 2016 @ 1957est. i was walking out of bahia honda state park, when i looked up at the moon. i saw something flying a crossed it, when i noticed that the object was literally up with sold red lights. they didn't look like airplane lights. i pulled out my cell phone and snapped a couple of pictures of the object with the moon, then took a video of the object. i took video of the object is lost sight of it. it was on a straight path then it went up. not sure how else to say it. i am always watching the stars and the sky, living in the florida keys the star watching is amazing. i'm not really sure what this was i saw, the lyrids meteor shower is beginning, which what i was watching for. after i saw the object. i spent the next few hours walking around watching the sky, but did not see anything else remotely the same.

both the pictures and video have been submitted with this report. as well as a photo of the moon taken shortly after the event, for reference to the angle of my viewing the event.
content.summary: Saw bright red lights on object with trail fly across moon, @ bahia honda statepark

content.detailedDescription:
About 9 pm 2 lights looking like fire orange(like the chinese wish lanterns but not lanterns they were not affected by the wind which was not much and did not drift) appeared over the ocean a few degrees above the horizon.Then another appeared and then another.One by one they seemed to go out ont by one.About 3 minutes later 11 one at a time appeared .One photo from rosario beach looked like an rounded arrow. i am about 15 miles south of rosario beach and here it looked like a happy face(i know that sounds very silly).
 each light seemed to be in to box like parts and pulsed.They were there for about 3=4 miutes and all went out one at a time.There was a large container ship in the area but it was much closer to shore.
when i looked through binoculars i could focus on the ship but not on the glowing things, which made me think they were very far away.
i called a few friends and only one was awake and also saw this
i saw no vehicle only these lights.
it was not a ship or a mast of a boat,it didn't come from the container ship going to ensenada and there was no cruise ship last night..It was not flairs or fire works..
but on facebook today 2 friends posted pictures and a video.I also saw another friend's video.
i will ask them to post on this site. i can not upload the photo
content.summary: Glowing lights like fire over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: There were at least 2 objects (2 could be seen from the witness' apartment) standing still in the sky at night. the objects were blinking red, blue and white, in an uninterrupted cicle, for more than 40 minutes. than they just disappeared, vanished in the night, suddenly, like they appeared in first place.
content.summary: 2 objects blinking in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dad home back to the country. the bright lights made me first notice it.At first i thought the bright lights were a police car up ahead before we bent the curve. it had a dome shape like a saucer with 3 stacks of lights going around in different directions. it hovered off the ground and it was force that was blowing the trees like it wanted to blow it down but there was no noise. i was afraid to go outside at night after the event for over 6 months, scared and wondering. i would not go back to ramer alabama at night at all. i lost sight of it after the ship put me back down and i watched it until it went out of sight.
content.summary: I was taking my dad who is deceased now, to ramer alabama & we saw it cross a field from a church. it took off and i dropped my dad off to gis house then on the way back, i saw it again.

content.detailedDescription: Took dog out. noticed 2 objects to my sse. low, moving steadily towards the east. both were dark in color, possibly black. one flying in front of other maybe 500 to 800 ft up. the one in the front continued its flight path and the other banked left and was now heading nne. no sound, just blue and red/orange lights. while it banked left, i managed to get a picture on my cell phone. once it completed its turn, i took another picture of it heading toward my house. it passed directly overhead. it looks bigger in the picture than it actually was because i had my phone camera zoomed in. the lights you see at the bottom of the picture is street lights and construction lights down a hill from house. the object is pictured making its turn before heading towards me. the second picture is after the turn, heading towards me. it continued its path and i watched it until i could see it no more. have no idea what it was but it wasn't from around here.
content.summary: 2 low flying, dark in color objects

content.detailedDescription: What am i supposed to do?
content.summary: Outside on my porch. i see different ones all the time and this is the first time i got a picture

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette out side my back door when i saw a light go straight up above the trees then it changed colour to three lights then stopped then moved to the left then went in a half round movement then went left again and i lost sight. this is not the first time i have seen something like this and i have reported this before. i lost sight over houses. and there was a humming noise soon after.
content.summary: A light went straight up then moved direction twice

content.detailedDescription:
I have only just decided to log this after such a long time, as i have always believed it to be more paranormal, but did some reading and realised the second was definitely an unidentified flying object of some kind.
my late husband and i went to our favorite beauty spot on the cliffs at botallack, nr st just in cornwall, uk. it was dinner time and we had bought fish and chips to eat in our old mg car out on the cliffs. i believe it was 23rd october 1992/93 at about 6pm. it was a beautiful evening and we were the only people parked there. as we looked out at the view of the cliffs, old tin mines and the atlantic ocean crashing in, we suddenly noticed somebody walking up the cliff path..... i have to say we both were a bit confused as walking up the cliffs was an olden times smuggler from the 1700/1800's period. (the best way to describe this is if you google 'poldark', that is the era.) what we could see was a man, in a black tri-star hat, long black old smuggler type coat, a long wooden staff in his left hand and a small barrel/ keg under his right arm. we both looked at each other and then back to him walking up the coast path. both confused at what we were looking at, i said to my husband, "maybe there is a party somewhere?" if you knew the location you would know that was at the best a long shot! we continued to watch this 'person' walk up the path as he reached the adjoining path he was suddenly gone! into thin air! we did not lose sight of him at any time..... and then he was gone! all i can tell you is that what we saw was as solid, as solid as you and i, although neither of us remember seeing features on a face, or to be honest, even a face. we knew that what we had just seen was unexplainable and couldn't get our minds around it.... it wasn't until we were driving home that i said, "did we just see a ghost?" now i aren't saying that is what we saw, but we have no explanation. i tell you this, as i believe that it must have some kind of connection to the following event.
about a week later, there was a big storm blowing with really strong gale force 'inland' winds. the sea was crashing in and the wind was too strong to get out of the car as you couldn't stand. we were sat in our car when we noticed behind us a white ball, approx 7 to 8 inches. you could see it was spinning furiously but it was not causing it to move in the slightest. it was approx 15 feet away from us and 6 feet off of the ground. the strangest thing was, that the gale force inland wind was not making it move at all, yet we couldn't even stand up in it! the 'ball'didn't move for about 2 minutes, then it slowly moved directly upwards by about 4 feet, again it hovered on the spot for several minutes before moving directly down again by 3 of 4 feet where again it hovered for a time. it then rose in to the air by approx 8 feet, again directly in a straight line and totally uneffected by the wind. it hovered for about 3 minutes before shooting inland at a 90 degree angle and out of sight. to be honest, we were shocked and just sat silently in the car. i think after what had happened the previous week, we thought it must be 'ghost' connected?......  for years the memory of what happened has never left us and i can still see the events in detail. i've tried to look for answers but can't find any. i only realised recently that 'the ball' was an unidentified flying object of some sort. so i have decided to record this with yourselves.
the whole of cornwall is built on granite and so is extremely quartz rich. i often questioned myself as to if there could have been some kind of portal open up? i hope that this piece of my jigsaw might fit somewhere in all the other events out there. thank you.
content.summary: Fast spinning, intelligent like sphere.
